item.title: Technologists Lightning Talks for DevOps World | Jenkins World 2019 San Francisco
item.description: The Technologists will be giving a bunch of lightning talks in the DevOps Theater at this years DevOps World | Jenkins World in San Francisco. Some of the topics we will be covering include (many of which we have already blogged about): Self-Updating Jenkins: GitOps for Jenkins Configuration This Lightning Talk will explore using GitOps to automate config updates for the CloudBees Jenkins Distribution. Jenkins Plugin Management as Code Letâ€™s admit it, Jenkins Plugin management can be a pain.
